history.narrative: Law 3-30, the “Animal Control Act of 1979,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-75, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 19, 1979 and July 3, 1979, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 7, 1979, it was assigned Act No. 3-80 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
